welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Royal Wootton Bassett, a charming and historical town known for its quaint streets and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and soak up all the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Brize Norton Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Private Terminal
